verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya kahe,-ei svarūpa-dāmodara
mahāprabhura haya iṅha dvitīya kalevara

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya kahe—the Bhaṭṭācārya said; ei—this gentleman; svarūpa-dāmodara—his name is Svarūpa Dāmodara; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; haya—is; iṅha—he; dvitīya—the second; kalevara—expansion of the body.
translation: Śrī Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya replied, "Here is Svarūpa Dāmodara, who is practically the second expansion of the body of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
